name: Cherry Crave maze
description:
A short and free little romp through 10 levels.

You play as Gabble, Babble's son"Hello!"

He is after fruit that grows underground exceptionally well!

However the Blolops, a evil sentient bitey balloon creatures don't want you touching their fruit! so it's up to Gabble to find the fruit and the legendary mythical Golden needle to defeat the evil bloplops and save the village!
